alert.note: Alert for Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Flagler and south central St. Johns Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Saint Augustine South to near Andalusia. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Spuds and Elkton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
